channel.title: NPC spawning
channel.description: Hey guys..ok im not gonna lie but im a noob at this. Can anyone please give me an example of how to spawn in my server...i know how to get to the hybridscape folder where i change the spwan info but i dont know HOW and what to put...help please?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2007, 05:17:43 PM[/size][hr]anyone???
